content: knitted sweater with raglan for men worked top down the piece is worked with drops air pattern no ai-239 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl finished measurements chest measurements 90-96-104-114-126-140 cm/35½ -37¾ -41 -45 -49½ -55 full length 64-66-68-70-72-74 cm/25¾ -26 -26¾ -27½ -28⅜ -29⅛ all measurements in chart are in cm **materials** drops air from garnstudio 350-400-400-450-450-500 g color 01 off white **knitting gauge ** 16 stitches and 20 row in stockinette stitch = 10 x 10 cm/4 x 4 **needles ** drops double pointed needles sizes 4 5 and 5 5 mm/us 7 and 9 drops circular needles sizes 4 5 and 5 5 mm/us 7 and 9 length 40 and 80 cm/16 and 32
